Monster Rancher World: The Introduction
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Incomplete Epics (left unfinished for over a year): Monster Rancher World: The Introduction
By CrimsonDragon on Saturday, August 31, 2002 - 03:10 pm:

It is the year 2003. A couple years ago, a video game company, Tecmo, created an awesome series of games known as Monster Rancher. This unique game that allowed its players to spawn monsters from any CD they owned. Once born, the monsters were raised into noble fighters, killing machines, brave explorers, and much more. Now, Tecmo, has just made Monster Rancher 3. However, there was a minor glitch. A glitch that tore a dimension between the Monster Rancher World and our own. Now, the monsters aren't just going to be trained on-screen. This event will change both worlds, forever, some good, and some bad, really bad.

By CrimsonDragon on Saturday, August 31, 2002 - 04:06 pm:

Feel free to post comments about my story.
